Package com.netflix.nicobar.core.module.jboss

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JBossModuleClassLoader
    base implementation of ModuleClassLoaders for this library Holds a ScriptArchive and adds simple life-cycle hooks adds a post-construction hook to inject classes into the classloader
    JBossModuleLoader
    Specialization of the ModuleLoader class which exposes many of the protected methods for convenience.
    JBossModuleUtils
    Utility methods for working with Modules
    JBossScriptModule
    Encapsulates a the compiled classes and the resources in a ScriptArchive
